author: bayard
msg: fixed commons-logging missing message, added ability to include an optional log4j jar in the examples war and switched to deploy-conf for the example log4j.properties so a version does not end up in WEB-INF/

msg: Switch over binary release download links to use mirror

msg: Update taglib releases to use www.apache.org/dist/jakarta/taglibs which can be mirrored
